Package com.g1.mychess.player.service

Interface PlayerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerServiceImpl
public interface PlayerService
Service interface for managing players in the system. Provides methods for creating, updating, retrieving, and interacting with players.

  • Method Details

    • createPlayer

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PlayerCreationResponseDTO> createPlayer(RegisterRequestDTO registerRequestDTO)
      Creates a new player in the system.
      Parameters:
      registerRequestDTO - the DTO containing the details for registering a new player.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the response information after the player creation, including player details.

    • updatePlayerPassword

      void updatePlayerPassword(Long playerId, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of an existing player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose password is to be updated.
      newPassword - the new password to be set for the player.

    • findPlayerByUsername

      UserDTO findPlayerByUsername(String username)
      Finds a player by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to be found.
      Returns:
      a UserDTO containing the player's details.

    • findPlayerById

      UserDTO findPlayerById(Long playerId)
      Finds a player by their player ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player to be found.
      Returns:
      a UserDTO containing the player's details.

    • findPlayerByEmail

      UserDTO findPlayerByEmail(String email)
      Finds a player by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the player to be found.
      Returns:
      a UserDTO containing the player's details.

    • getPlayerDetails

      PlayerDTO getPlayerDetails(Long playerId)
      Retrieves detailed information about a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose details are to be fetched.
      Returns:
      a PlayerDTO containing detailed player information.

    • reportPlayer

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> reportPlayer(ReportPlayerRequestDTO reportPlayerRequestDTO)
      Allows a player to report another player.
      Parameters:
      reportPlayerRequestDTO - the DTO containing the details of the report.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the response message after reporting the player.

    • blacklistPlayer

      void blacklistPlayer(Long playerId)
      Blacklists a player, preventing them from participating in certain activities.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player to be blacklisted.

    • whitelistPlayer

      void whitelistPlayer(Long playerId)
      Removes a player from the blacklist, allowing them to participate in activities again.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player to be whitelisted.

    • searchPlayers

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<PlayerDTO> searchPlayers(String query, int page, int size)
      Searches for players based on a query string.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query string to find players by.
      page - the page number for pagination.
      size - the number of players per page.
      Returns:
      a Page containing a list of PlayerDTO objects for the search results.

    • followPlayer

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> followPlayer(Long followerId, Long followedId)
      Allows a player to follow another player.
      Parameters:
      followerId - the ID of the player who is following.
      followedId - the ID of the player who is being followed.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the response message after following the player.

    • unfollowPlayer

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> unfollowPlayer(Long followerId, Long followedId)
      Allows a player to unfollow another player.
      Parameters:
      followerId - the ID of the player who is unfollowing.
      followedId - the ID of the player who is being unfollowed.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the response message after unfollowing the player.

    • getFollowedPlayers

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<PlayerDTO> getFollowedPlayers(Long followerId, int page, int size)
      Retrieves a list of players followed by a specific player.
      Parameters:
      followerId - the ID of the player whose followed players are to be retrieved.
      page - the page number for pagination.
      size - the number of players per page.
      Returns:
      a Page containing a list of PlayerDTO objects for the followed players.

    • getFollowers

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<PlayerDTO> getFollowers(Long playerId, int page, int size)
      Retrieves a list of players following a specific player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose followers are to be retrieved.
      page - the page number for pagination.
      size - the number of players per page.
      Returns:
      a Page containing a list of PlayerDTO objects for the followers.
